title: SYSTEM$REGISTRY_LIST_IMAGES — Deprecated | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This function has been deprecated. Use the SHOW IMAGES IN IMAGE REPOSITORY command instead.
Available to accounts in AWS and Microsoft Azure commercial regions, with some exceptions. For more information, see Available regions.
Lists images in an image repository.
Working with an Image Registry and Repository
Name of the database in which the repository is created.
Name of the database in which the repository is created.
Returns a JSON object listing all the images.
You need the read permission on the repository to get a list of images.
This function retrieves a list of images from the /tutorial_db/data_schema/tutorial_repository repository.
